column17:
Pampers Active Baby Medium Diapers - 20 Pads:
Give your child a comfort feeling with these Pampers Active Baby Medium Diapers of 20 Pads that is suitable for babies weighing between 6-11 kg. These diapers have a lotion with aloe vera extract that protects the baby's soft skin from rashes. What is unique about this diaper is that it can absorb up to six glasses of water which will keep your child comfortable for long hours. Featuring waist tape sticks this pack of diapers from Pampers can be a great choice for the comfort of your kid.
